root.name: Sorcerer
root.description: Sorcerer is a Fantasy Game of Interactive Fiction written by Steve Meretzky, and is the second game in the Enchanter Trilogy. It was published in 1984 by Infocom. Sorcerer picks up where Enchanter left off, after the defeat of Krill. Belboz, the main character's master, has disappeared and the player must discover what has happened to Belboz.
